formElement.label: Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Starteam project. (Required)

formElement.label: View Name:
formElement.documentation: This can be the name of a single view or a ":"-separated view hierarchy as defined by Starteam. The hierarchy must start from the root view.

formElement.label: Folder Path:
formElement.documentation: You can leave this blank if the path that you are monitoring starts in the root folder. If you want to monitor a sub-path within the root folder, you can specify that path as a "/"-separated hierarchy, starting from the folder immediately below the root folder.

formElement.label: Label:
formElement.documentation: You can leave this blank if you don't use labels.

formElement.label: Additional Options:
formElement.documentation: This can be any option sent to starteam with correct spacing '-o -filter "IOGU"'.

formElement.label: Quiet time minutes:
formElement.documentation: The number of minutes of no check-in activity required before launching the procedure.

formElement.label: Enabled for ElectricSentry:
formElement.documentation: Enable for continuous integration monitoring by ElectricSentry.
